content: Each sip from the Gourd will restore 33% of your maximum health by default with the Coconut Wine, and the Gourd has four uses by default.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Old Gourd'.
The content is as follows:
Each sip from the Gourd will restore 33% of your maximum health by default with the Coconut Wine, and the Gourd has four uses by default.
